description: Falis, now in the body of Alita, liberates the Forland castle from Dr. Akamashi and his henchrobots, Ana and Yuna. The real Alita, now in the body of Falis, assumes the role of Jodu`s deceased granddaughter Milano, who died while acting as a substitute for Alita. In Alita`s place, Falis is crowned as the Queen of Forland. However, the coronation parade is disturbed by Dr. Akamashi`s evil plans.
